lines.text: What is your name?
William O'Malley.
I did not call you.
You called for all the Jews. I'm Jewish, just like Jesus Christ. You take one, you gotta take us all.
Did anyone ever tell you that you have beautiful legs?
Oh, Nick! You can't see them from here.
No, but I do have a good imagination. Well, actually I'm just trying to be nice.
I was in Beirut 20 years ago. You should've been here then. It was beautiful! Beirut had casinos, dances, parties, concerts. It was the Las Vegas of the Middle East.
It's a go. TAKE THEM DOWN!
I'll see you when I see you

[after taking out a terrorist]
Sleep tight, sucker.
Here are some blankets for the night.
How about some beds?
You don't need beds, you're gonna die tomorrow.
Better hurry, Nick... I think there's gonna be reinforcements on the way.
How do you know?
Something I heard on the radio.
I didn't know you spoke Arabic?
If we don't get outta here, we're all gonna be speaking it!

[Coronel Alexander to Major McCoy]
General Woodbridge is waiting for the 'Go Ahead' from the president, Im waiting for the 'Go Ahead' from General Woodbridge, and you are waiting for the 'Go Ahead' from me.
By God, the women are safe.

[to terrorist that was hiding under the bed]
Sleep tight, Sucker!

[to Abdul, who is running out of the house]
Going somewhere?

[McCoy fires a bazooka from the roof]
McCoy, what are you doing up there?... Drop that thing and get down here, QUICK!
What do you want me to do... JUMP?
I don't care what you do, get down here... FAST!
If you try to be clever with me, Captain, I will kill you.
That would make you a real hero, wouldn't it?
Yes, yes. Now, you go back to the press, but you watch what you say, huh?
Now, ask your questions please, one at a time.

[Pete has succumbed to his wounds]
Greater love than no man hath he gives up his life for a friend. Heavenly father, we humbly ask you that you cherish this most loving soul in the palm of your hand for all eternity. In the name of the father, of the son and of the holy ghost.
[closes Pete's eyes]

[to his wife, Edie, after his name is called by Ingrid, the purser]
We survived once, we can do it again.

[to Mustafa after he is called to first class with the other Jewish passengers]
You just keep your hands off of my daughter.

[to Ingrid after she is released]
Ingrid... you are a brave woman.
Now, Ms. Harding, this will only take a few minutes.
What's happening?
The Algerian Commandos are going to break into the plane.
Oh no, don't. All the hostages in Beirut, they'll kill them all.
What hostages?
The guys from the navy and all the Jews they took off the plane when the other hijackers came on.

[panicked]
What other hijackers?
All those men who came on board, 10 or 12 of them.
God! All sections! All sections!
